description: What is the revenue from financial services for IBM?
Identify the corporation with the highest revenue from financial services.
Calculate the total revenue from financial services for Microsoft, Dell, and Accenture combined.
Find any corporation that has a significantly lower revenue compared to others.
Determine if there is a correlation between the corporation name and its revenue from financial services.
List the corporations with a revenue from financial services greater than 8 billion U.S. dollars.
Arrange the corporations from the highest to the lowest revenue from financial services.
What is the range of the revenue from financial services across all corporations?
Identify the percentage of corporations with a revenue from financial services less than 10 billion U.S. dollars.
Identify any clusters of corporations with similar revenue figures.
